text: Silver Lake is an unincorporated community located at the north end of Silver Lake in the town of Madison, New Hampshire, in Carroll County, New Hampshire, United States. Joy Farm, summer home of E. E. Cummings, is a National Historic Landmark located north of the village. Silver Lake has a different ZIP code (03875) from the rest of the town of Madison. ==References== ==External links== * Town of Madison, New Hampshire * Madison Library * Madison Historical Society Category:Unincorporated communities in New Hampshire Category:Unincorporated communities in Carroll County, New Hampshire
title: Silver Lake, New Hampshire
